UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Bacteriocin ASM1 is an O/S-diglycosylated, plasmid-encoded homologue of glycocin F
Literature.Author: Main P, Hata T, Loo TS, Man P, Novak P, Havlíček V, Norris GE, Patchett ML

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lactiplantibacillus plantarum ATCC 8014(IC50=0.0015µM),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum DSM 13273(IC50=0.0015µM),Lactobacillus acidophilus(IC50=0.0015µM),Latilactobacillus sakei(IC50=0.0015µM),Enterococcus faecalis V583(no activity data),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus(no activity data),Weissella viridescens DSM 20410(no activity data)
